entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
